author: jm
msg: bug 5057: spamc was using getaddrinfo(NULL) to get localhost address info; unfortunately, on linux that returns IPv6 addressing, whereas we want to default to IPv4 unless otherwise specified.  use getaddrinfo('127.0.0.1') instead

author: bdudney
msg: one more step towards a complete assembly - moved the source for documentation export into the build-tools module - cleaned up the description as the maven-jar-plugin is hosing the manifest and jar file (prob because of the newline in the description)

author: kahatlen
msg: Make sure the logWriter is not null before printing the stack trace.

author: jm
msg: bug 5060: backport ArchiveIterator changes for rule-QA system, namely: the AICache caching subsystem for faster mass-checks, support for combined --head/--tail semantics, more verbose 'showdots' to avoid buildbot timeouts, and a new intra-child IPC mechanism for multi-child mass-checks
